channel.title: Hugo on Leonard
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Leonard

item.title: Setup an In-Site Search
item.description: Introduction Hugo is a static website constructor, based on GO. In this article we will realize a search tools for the posts in your blog. It is well introduced in the official doc: [hugo doc]. Here we use the commercial search service: Algolia [Algolia site] . Algolia has a free plan for personal use, which provides 10,000 records and 100,000 indexing operations per month.
